name: Sleepsoundssoothingrain
0:
”Alexa, open soothing rain”
”Alexa, start soothing rain”
”Alexa, launch soothing rain”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: soothing rain
des:
Sleep sounds: soothing rain a gentle, rhythmic patter of raindrops softly striking a variety of surfaces. The ambient harmony created by the rain is punctuated by subtle undertones of distant, low-pitched thunder rolling across a calm, overcast sky. The rain’s timbre is mellow and consistent, giving rise to a sense of tranquility and freshness. Occasional droplets can be heard tapping against window panes, creating a comforting, intimate atmosphere indoors. The natural cadence of the rainfall promotes relaxation, enfolding the listener in a cocoon of serene, acoustic textures that mimic a natural white noise.

Alexa, open soothing rain

Alexa, start soothing rain

Alexa, launch soothing rain

To loop for 6 hours, Set sleep timer to 6 hours.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
